content.description: Start climbing on a lichen-covered slab past 2 bolts to a ledge.  Swing around the arete and make big, steep moves through the roof and past a small tree to the anchors.  Feel the exposure of Reudi Dam 1000 feet below you!
content.location:
This is the last climb at the Yonder Area.  It is located at the very top of the crag around the corner from '

Gone Beyonder

.'

content.description: Climb up an easy slab to the first bolt (you can use a medium nut to protect the runout to the bolt).  A balancy slab moves bring you to a great horizontal rest.  Above this, tackle a tricky crux sequence to the fun, steep headwall above.
content.location: This is the 4th climb as you walk through the Yonder Area.  The climb starts just before the trail cuts up along a big dihedral capped with a roof.

content.description:
One of the best routes at the Yonder Area, 'Gone Beyonder' tackles the right-leaning line of bolts.  The crux hits you quick around the 1st bolt and the climb eases up dramatically from there; but it's not over.  Continue on really fun, steep climbing up the headwall on great holds!

Stick clip the first high bolt or you can use a #3 Camalot to protect the few easy moves getting to the bolt.
content.location: This is the 2nd-to-last route at the Yonder Area.  Look for the right-angling line of bolts.
